summary:
If you always thought that the little dragons in the game then this mod is for you!
This mod adds 18 new dragon with their abilities and they are 5 times stronger than the default!
adding more new dragons with new abilities.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/156/logo2no.png[/img][/center]

[size=3][center][color=db8f0b]If you like this mod please do not forget to evaluate it![/center][/size][/color]

[size=3][center][color=db8f0b] [b]--NEW dRAGONS-- [/b] [/color]
If you always thought that the little dragons in the game then this mod is for you!
This mod adds 18 new dragon with their abilities and they are 5 times stronger than the default!
adding more new dragons with new abilities.

[b][color=db8f0b]---WHAT DOES THIS MOD---[/color][/b]
[color=000dff][b]Adds 18 new dragons.[/b][/color] 
The new dragon is 5 times stronger than the default.
In the new dragon is much more xp.
Was much stronger than fire damage, or frost attacks.
New dragons have become very dangerous in close combat.
Enhanced by mowing attack and stroke tail.
Scaled up their speed and flight, which makes difficult the use of magic and screams
[color=000dff]Now you can optionally download the standard resolution textures.[/color]
[color=ffea00]Added a version of the balanced forces of dragons.[/color]old
[color=ffea00]Changed levels of spawn dragons.[/color]

[color=db8f0b]---Updates---[/color]
[color=ff7700]Update 2.0[/color]
[color=5e5e5e]Added steam dragon.[/color]
[color=8c00ff]Added a magical dragon.(It can be seen only in Sovngarde during the last main quest!)[/color]
Now the dragons are balanced is the main file!
Updated textures of green dragon.
Updated texture black dragon.
Updated the texture Sea dragon.
Updated the texture ancient Sea dragon.
[color=8c00ff]After killing the a magical dragon can ask for its help to 180 seconds.[/color]
[color=ff7700]Update 2.5[/color]
Updated texture Desert dragon.
Updated texture ancient green dragon.
updated texture ancient black dragon.
updated texture brown dragon.
Updated texture red ancient dragon.
[color=ff7700]Added new shouts black ancient dragon.[/color]
[color=ff7700]Added new shouts ancient ice dragon.[/color]
[color=ff7700]Update 2.8[/color]
[color=5d8dd4]Added Dragon Nahkriin[/color]
[color=b05b00]Added Supreme Fire dragon[/color]
[color=ff0000]Amplified sounds dragons![/color]
[color=ff7700]Update 3.0[/color]
Updated texture red dragon.
Updated texture zeym.
Updated texture ancient ice dragon.
[color=ff0000]Removed in some locations spawn new dragons.[/color]
[color=ff0000]Added a new spawn point of dragons.[/color]

[color=db8f0b][b]--list of dragons--[/b][/color]
[color=green]black dragon level 10 attack fire[/color]
[color=green]dragon green level 10 attack fire[/color]
[color=green]Sea dragon level 10 attack fire[/color]
[color=green]dragon red level 10 attack fire[/color]
[color=green]Ice dragon level 25 attack frost[/color]
[color=yellow]dragon desert level 25 attack fire[/color]
[color=yellow]zeym  level 25 attack fire[/color]
[color=yellow]dragon white level 25 attack fire[/color]  
[color=yellow]dragon brown  level 25 attack fire[/color]
[color=5c1515]Red ancient dragon level 65 attack fire[/color]
[color=5c1515]Ancient green dragon level 65 attack fire[/color]
[color=5c1515]Ancient Sea Dragon level 65 attack fire[/color]
[color=5c1515]Steam dragon level 65 attack steam[/color]  
[color=5c1515]Dragon Nahkriin level 65 attack fire/storm with lightning[/color]  
[color=red]Ancient Ice Dragon level 85 attack frost/storm with lightning/Ice form[/color]
[color=red]Black Ancient Dragon level 85 attack fire/attack frost/fiery rain/Ice form[/color]
[color=8c00ff]Magical dragon level 95 attack fire/fiery rain/storm with lightning[/color]
[color=b05b00]Supreme Fire dragon level 100 attack fire/fiery rain[/color]

[color=db8f0b][b]installation[/b][/color]
copy the file to Skyrim\\Data\\
Place the file in the folder [color=bd600f]NEW dRAGONS3.0[/color] your game data folder!
Do not forget to include a plug-in manager!

[color=8d0fd6][b]ADDITION[/b][/color]

[color=db8f0b][b]---id dragons----[/b][/color]

[color=ff6600]id to spawn the usual, ancient, fiery dragons xx00cf87[/color]
[color=00ffcc]id to spawn ice dragons xx01bd57[/color]
[color=8c00ff]id to spawn magical dragon xx0208c5[/color]

[b][color=5c1515]Where xx is the number of fashion in the NMM[/color][/b]

-------------------

[color=red][b]Do not place material without my permission![/b][/color][/center][/size]

[color=db8f0b]by fashion esey.[/color]
author: esey
